duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and optimize machine learning compilers for high-performance computing environments.
Work with MLIR/LLVM to enhance the functionality and performance of machine learning frameworks.
Collaborate with the development team to integrate compiler solutions for CPU and GPU acceleration.
Contribute to the deep understanding and improvement of machine learning frameworks and their interaction with compilers.
Contribute to the roadmap and execution of machine learning compiler development, taking into consideration funding and strategic goals.
